text: Kamaghɨn kɨ izɨva, an arazir kam aghurigham. An en gun tintinibar me mɨgɨa akar kurabar en gun me mɨgei. A kamaghɨram amir puvatɨ, a uaghan Kraisɨn adarazi isa uan dɨpenimɨn zuir puvatɨ. Ezɨ igharaz darazi me inigh uan dɨpenibar mangasava amima, ezɨ a uaghan men anogorogha siosɨn aven me batogha, me abɨsi.
